turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Brian, can you order coffee for me from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, do you want it from the one on Market St.?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you please order me a grande Americano light ice?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want regular milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you ask for soy please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you want from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should be is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so to confirm, you just want a grande soy light ice Americano from Starbucks on Market St.?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Ordering now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great thanks,

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I just placed your order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, when can I pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's going to be ready in about 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. And receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's going to be sent to your phone.
